医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
礼宾方法使更多人可以接受肾脏移植并消除差异希望进行肾脏移植的患者必须首先进行一系列医疗测试，以确定他们是否是适合手术的候选者，并且足够健康，以服用移植后免疫抑制剂药物以防止器官排斥。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/concierge-apphack-enables-enables-more-people-to-receive-kidney-transplans-transplants-and-erases-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/concierge-apprace-enables-enables-more-people-people-to-receive-kidney-transplans-transplants-and-erases-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d13f332-1e7e-4f87-4f87-82b3-667894e3dcb5 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 21:37:30 -0400 Concierge approach enables more people to receive kidney transplants and erases disparities
研究揭示了树突如何连接大脑的记忆如果您曾经注意到同一天的记忆如何相互联系，而几周间的事件会分开，那么一项新的研究揭示了原因：我们的大脑实际上将记忆的时间与神经元细胞体内的记忆联系在一起，而是在神经元的细胞体中，而是在其刺激性扩展中被称为树突。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/research-reveals-how-dendrites-connect-memories-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/research-reveals-how-dendrites-connect-memories-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=468fb66b-4860-4860-4b4e-9991-10a3f7cca3eb Sat, 22 Mar 2025 21:23:00 -0400 Research reveals how dendrites connect memories in the brain
研究发现了对抗幽门螺杆菌感染的有希望的替代策略这项研究由北京中国科学院生物物理学研究所的Lizeng Gao小组报道。日益增长的抗生素耐药性问题需要对高度普遍的幽门螺杆菌感染进行替代治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/20250322/study-finds-a-promising-anternative-strategy-for-combating-h- pylori-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/study-finds-a-promising-anternative-strategy-for-for-comband-for-combating-h-pylori-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fda2Dee-0470-4DDA-A817-C4A1A665161A Sat, 22 Mar 2025 21:15:18 -0400 Study finds a promising alternative strategy for combating H. pylori infections
杜克大学和NUS医学启动了有史以来的首个联合中心，以推动代谢组学研究为了进行医学研究和创新的战略举动，杜克大学医学院和新加坡国立大学宽oo林医学院（NUS医学）已推出了他们的第一个联合研究中心系统代谢组学中心（SYSMEC）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/duke-nus-nus-and-nus-nus-medicine-launch-first-first-ever-ever-ever-center-center-to-drive-metabolomics-rasearch.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/duke-nus-nus-and-nus-nus-nus-medicine-launch-first-first-ever-ever-ever-center-center-to-drive-metabolomics-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e3f60f10-5C3A-473A-473A-8F16-EA4ADE1760A4 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 21:12:15 -0400 Duke-NUS and NUS Medicine launch first-ever joint center to drive metabolomics research
PathPresenter引入ConsultConnect，零覆盖Web门户网站，用于远程第二意见数字病理学工作流软件的领导者PathPresenter很高兴地宣布ConsultConnect，这是一种新的数字病理咨询和远程第二意见的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/20250322/pathPresenter-indroduces-consultConnect-a-zere-footprintprint-web-portart-portal-portal-portal-for remote-Remote-second-opinions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/20250322/pathPresenter-indrodcees-consultConnect-a- Zero-footprint-footprint-web-portal-portal-for-for-remote-remote-second-opinions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb75f9f1-e886-4cdf-9E2A-3A4B9ABBF468 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 00:14:00 -0400 PathPresenter introduces ConsultConnect, a zero footprint web portal for remote second opinions
开创性研究揭示了神经元身份调节的关键机制西班牙国家研究委员会（CSIC）的联合中心和Elche的MiguelHernández大学（UMH）的一组研究人员与哥伦比亚大学（纽约州纽约）的研究人员合作，确定了一种调节来自同一基因的两种不同蛋白质的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/groundBreaking-Study-unveils-key-mechanism-for-neuronal-indistity-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250322/groundBreaking-Study-unveils-key-mechanism-for-neuronal-indistity-nistity-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1B326186-EA36-4670-A865-741405CC8ED9 Sat, 22 Mar 2025 00:12:20 -0400 Groundbreaking study unveils key mechanism for neuronal identity regulation
基于视频的新方法增强了婴儿痉挛综合征的检测Shenyang计算技术研究所，CAS和中国PLA综合医院联合团队联合团队行为一系列关于婴儿痉挛综合征（IESS）的调查，也称为West综合征，发现了一种基于视频的癫痫发作检测方法，可有效提高婴儿痉挛识别的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/new-video基于m-video-method-method-enhances-detection-detection-of-infantile-passms-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/new-video基于m-video-lase-method-enhances-detection-detection-of-infantile-passms-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61A3B23C-C453-463F-8624-0344A3D60937 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 23:35:58 -0400 New video-based method enhances detection of infantile spasms syndrome
针对大脑的废物清除系统可能有助于打击认知能力下降随着衰老身体的下降，大脑失去了清除废物的能力，科学家认为这种情况可能会导致神经退行性疾病，例如阿尔茨海默氏病和帕金森氏病等。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/targeting-braine28099s-waste-removal-system-may-help-help-compat-cobtat-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/targeting-braine28099s-waste-waste-removal-system-may-help-help-compat-cobtat-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9eb9eb9ddae-a97a-440b-b250-27ac9dda42e9 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 22:13:11 -0400 Targeting brain’s waste removal system may help combat cognitive decline
新药组合显示了治疗黑色素瘤脑转移的希望由Sheri Holmen博士领导的联邦资助研究团队，亨斯曼癌症研究所的研究员，犹他大学外科教授（U）（U），正在测试一种新的组合药物疗法，可以治疗和预防黑色素瘤转移或从原始部位传播到大脑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/new-drug-combination-shows-shows-promise-in----------------------------------------------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/new-drug-combination-shows-shows-promise-promise-in-wareating-melanoma-brain-brain-metastasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f69d507-7300-452f-9212-70ED9C280FC6 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 21:56:18 -0400 New drug combination shows promise in treating melanoma brain metastasis
研究揭示了虚拟身体疼痛如何破坏所有权的意识广岛大学的一项研究发现，当人们被告知人们想象自己的虚拟身体痛苦时，他们的大脑抵制了所有权的幻想。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/study-reveals-how-virtual-body-body-pain-disrupts-sense-sense-of-howlliphers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250321/study-reveals-how-virtual-body-body-pain-disrupts-sense-sense-sense-of-howlhips.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65165fcb-3d69-42b3-b8fc-2971Edf11884 Fri, 21 Mar 2025 21:33:00 -0400 Study reveals how virtual body pain disrupts sense of ownership
